title: lord prithvi
review: A temple dedicated to lord prithivnath is located in the shahganj area of agra. It is a place of worship reachable by public transportation as well

title: Lord shiva temple
review: Famous once prithvi nath chauhaan established a shivling when his horse got stuck in war and after getting a blessing of shiva won the war

title: ancient Shiva Temple
review: Prithvinath Temple is temple of Lord Shiva. This is one of the four temples located on the four corners of Agra city. It is located at Shahganj on the way to Jaipur.It is a very old and reputed temple in Agra. Shivaratri is a grand festival at this temple and is observed with great pomp and glory where the local people and tourists from all around the country join in to celebrate. There is a holy bull of Hindu Mythology, Nandi, that stands confronting the fundamental god of Shiva in the focal point of the sanctuary patio in the temple. The divinity of Lord Shiva is accepted to be a few several age and still continues as before, the accurate time of it is obscure in the history.
